category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_show_ProjectTeamTableTreeView
preference.preference_description: Controls the display of project team in Active Workspace. If this preference is set to true, TC_Project team will be displayed in table tree view in Active Workspace. If this preference is set to false, TC_Project team will be displayed in table view in Active Workspace. The default value is true.
